On 02.02.21, the OP preliminary talk including corona test was due, everything was explained to me well and could ask my questions without time pressure, thanks for that. I have to say one more thing to the sister (think Tanja) who carried out the Covid 19 test (which I was really scared of) with such calmness and calm, I thank you very much. Now to the OK on 02/04/21 by Dr. Fr√∂mel and the (A) doctor Meuer and was also explained to me during the operation, I give full marks, also here a big thank you.
I don't want to forget the anesthesiologists who did a great job either, thank you here too. The whole nursing team and doctors harmonize and that makes a lot of difference ... Two days later today, I can only laugh at my fear of the operation .. Crazy. Whether the building is old or new, whether the food could be better are questions that don't interest me personally, because I'm not there because of the building or the food but because of my health ...
